title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Movie: Kurenai Densetsu
synopsis: It is not strange that the Demon Lord's forces fear the Crimson Demons, the clan from which Megumin and Yunyun originate. Even if the Demon Lord's generals attack their village, the Crimson Demons can just easily brush them off with their supreme mastery of advanced and overpowered magic.
